name: Turn Around (itch) (frederic.ye)
description:
Turn Around.

Made for a school project.

Small prototype game where you can change the direction of the gravity.

To help you with this pretty mind destroying feature, there is a gigantic green arrow on each level to show you where the next gravity changing will be.

To play the game:

WASD: to move around

1: to change gravity

Hope you have fun with the prototype.

We unfortunately didn't have time to create a good level design to use this mechanic but I hope you can have fun with it anyway.

If you finish the level 2... You can consider yourself a pro gamer cause there will be no tutorial.

Good luck.
